version_description: • Fixed an address issue

• WeChat refer
• Confirm reverse-geocoded address with customers before placing order
• Fixed incorrect address issue
• Minor change for restaurant tip
- Better analytics

- Added more restaurant icons
- Added more cities to explore
- Changed style for restaurant promotion
- Changed algorithm for most popular food
- Changed customer support flow
- Fixed an address issue

- Added 'Get Help' section with detailed solutions for most order issues
- Added 'RICEPO Picks' category in menu for each restaurant
- Hid unavailable food items
- Added recent ordered restaurant / food feature
- Supported food with minimum price restriction
- Restricted custom tip amount to be integer only
- Better error message for address verify fail

- Fixed address auto-complete issue in Spain
- Fixed currency issue for Apple Pay in Spain
- fixed currency issue
- Supported Discover card in Apple Pay
- Added support for iPhone X

・Brand new design
・Added profile page and order history
・Improved restaurant icons
・Improved checkout experience
- minor issue fixes

- Proudly launched our service in UK and France
- Optimized the splash animation
- Supported login with Chinese mobile phone number
- Add more explore cities
- Fixed minor bug in menu page

- Fixed wrong formatting for E.164 phone number
- Optimized food options page
- Fixed minor issues

- Special launch image for Chinese New Year
- Changed default icon for restaurant
- Minor issue fix

- Updated to spring splash screen
- Fixed currency issue in Europe
- Enforced apt for Europe address
- Union Pay 12% Off Promo
UnionPay Credit Card (Card number starting with 62), 12% Off Promo

· UnionPay Credit Card (Card number starting with 62), 12% Off Promo
· New Payment Method Alipay Available Now
- Minor issue fixes

- RICEPO now supports WeChat Pay
- Summer splash image
- Upgraded push notification service
UnionPay Credit Card (Card number starting with 62), 38% Off Promotion. Starting from Aug. 18 to Oct. 18
- Enhanced Alipay flow
- minor issue fix

- Added city name in address and checkout page to reduce chance of wrong address
- Added RICEPO delivery icon for all non-restaurant delivery
- More detailed delivery status (eg: pickup completed, at drop-off)
- Added customer total saving from RICEPO
- Added min / max requirement for each option group
- Updated customer support flow: customer can call restaurant directly for restaurant related tickets

- Added Malaysian food and Ramen icon
- Autumn launch image

- Added cap for percentage coupon
- Added edit icon for address / payment in checkout page
- Refactored Google Maps

- Adjusted map resolution
- Minor issue fixes
- Union Pay 38% Off
- Enhanced credit card form

- Display order create time
- Added `Change Phone Number` ticket
- Restrict delivery address without zip code
- Updated splash screen
- Enhanced Alipay flow
* Updated restaurant delivery fee info
- Minor issue fix

RICEPO V6
- Brand new design
- Added dish pictures
- updated screenshots
- minor issue fix
- modified payment flow
- minor bug fixes
- minor issue fix
- minor issue fix
- minor issue fix
- minor issue fix
